author: Moanwar
body:
Updating the ONNX interface batch size check. Previously, if the batch size did not match input_dim[0], an error was raised. This is not optimal for GNN models, where each input can have a different shape  for example, the number of nodes may differ from the number of edges. With this PR, the batch size is now updated dynamically based on input_dim[0].

Tagging @valsdav
title: Update batch size in ONNX interface
